Ask Alexa or Hey Google to launch channels, search for entertainment, control your streaming, and more. You can also control your TV using the Apple Home app or Siri on your Apple devices. Roku is America’s #1 TV streaming platform based on hours streamed – Hypothesis Group, December 2022
